name: BaIance
description:
BaIance is a tower defense shooter game, where the towers chase enemies. You should mine the gold boulders to get gold coins, which you need in order to shoot and build. You have to protect your Orb of Balance, otherwise the enemies will become overpowered. As you play the game, more enemies appear. Good luck!

Controls:
WASD to move
Left click to shoot and place builds
B to open the building menu, you can not shoot while in this mode so keep that in mind
F1 to open the settings menu, which you can mute the music and see your FPS
Number buttons 1-6 to select a build

Source code for the game is available here on my GitHub:
https://github.com/abysssal/balance-source
